code: import axios from"axios";const API_URL="http://localhost:8080/api/auth/";class AuthService{login(username,password){return axios.post(API_URL+"login",{username,password}).then(response=>{if(response.data.token){localStorage.setItem("user",JSON.stringify(response.data));}return response.data;});}register(username,password,role){return axios.post(API_URL+"register",{username,password,role});}logout(){localStorage.removeItem("user");}getCurrentUser(){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user"));}getUserRole(){const user=this.getCurrentUser();return user?user.role:null;}}export default new AuthService();
